name: An Appeal to Heaven
description:
In 1978, the Jonestown massacre claims 918 lives: An Appeal to Heaven is a visual novel which follows a deprogrammer who joins the anti-cult movement founded in Jonestown’s wake, who claims to be “rescuing” cultists by abducting, imprisoning, and abusing them until they renounce their religious beliefs. 

Developed for GAM3003 at Middlesex University. Originally intended as one episode in a larger story, released here for the purposes of examination and enjoyment.
